languages.text: "Жжем бедняцкие хибары, Лорд-капитан! Чернь лепит их, перекрывая поступление воздуха в соседний отсек и затрудняя работы инфернусам. Мы много раз говорили серфам убраться отсюда, но они не слушали. Капитан Френзо распорядился все сжечь, а после — огородить эту зону".

traits.locale_text: "Жжем бедняцкие хибары, Лорд-капитан! Чернь лепит их, перекрывая поступление воздуха в соседний отсек и затрудняя работы инфернусам. Мы много раз говорили серфам убраться отсюда, но они не слушали. Капитан Френзо распорядился все сжечь, а после — огородить эту зону".

languages.text: "Burning the poor shacks, Lord Captain! The rabble build them, cutting off the air supply to the next bay and making it difficult for the inferni to work. We've told the serfs to get out of here time after time, but they won't listen. Captain Frensoe has ordered everything to be burned down, and afterward, this area to be sealed off."
languages.original_text: "Жжем бедняцкие хибары, Лорд-капитан! Чернь лепит их, перекрывая поступление воздуха в соседний отсек и затрудняя работы инфернусам. Мы много раз говорили серфам убраться отсюда, но они не слушали. Капитан Френзо распорядился все сжечь, а после — огородить эту зону".

traits.locale_text: "Burning the poor shacks, Lord Captain! The rabble build them, cutting off the air supply to the next bay and making it difficult for the inferni to work. We've told the serfs to get out of here time after time, but they won't listen. Captain Frensoe has ordered everything to be burned down, and afterward, this area to be sealed off."

We've told the serfs to get out of here time after time, but they won't listen. Captain Frensoe has ordered everything to be burned down, and afterward, this area to be sealed off."

We've told the serfs to get out of here time after time, but they won't listen. Captain Frensoe has ordered everything to be burned down, and afterward, this area to be sealed off."

"Burning the poor shacks, Lord Captain! The rabble build them, cutting off the air supply to the next bay and making it difficult for the inferni to work. We've told the serfs to get out of here time after time, but they won't listen. Captain Frensoe has ordered everything to be burned down, and afterward, this area to be sealed off."

"Burning the poor shacks, Lord Captain! The rabble build them, cutting off the air supply to the next bay and making it difficult for the inferni to work. We've told the serfs to get out of here time after time, but they won't listen. Captain Frensoe has ordered everything to be burned down, and afterward, this area to be sealed off."

languages.text: «¡Quemando estas chozas, Lord Capitán! La plebe las construyó aquí y están bloqueando el suministro de aire al compartimento contiguo, de modo que los infernus no pueden trabajar. Les hemos dicho una y otra vez que se vayan, pero no nos hacen caso. El capitán Frensoe ha ordenado que lo quememos todo y luego sellemos esta zona».
languages.original_text: "Burning the poor shacks, Lord Captain! The rabble build them, cutting off the air supply to the next bay and making it difficult for the inferni to work. We've told the serfs to get out of here time after time, but they won't listen. Captain Frensoe has ordered everything to be burned down, and afterward, this area to be sealed off."

traits.locale_text: «¡Quemando estas chozas, Lord Capitán! La plebe las construyó aquí y están bloqueando el suministro de aire al compartimento contiguo, de modo que los infernus no pueden trabajar. Les hemos dicho una y otra vez que se vayan, pero no nos hacen caso. El capitán Frensoe ha ordenado que lo quememos todo y luego sellemos esta zona».

languages.text: 「哀れな小屋を燃やしているのですよ、ロード・キャプテン！徒党を組んで小屋を建てると、隣のベイへの空気の供給が遮断され、インフェルニが働きづらくなる。農奴たちに何度も何度もここから出て行けと言ったが、聞く耳を持ちません。フレンソー中隊長はすべてを焼き払って一帯を封鎖するよう命じました」
languages.original_text: "Burning the poor shacks, Lord Captain! The rabble build them, cutting off the air supply to the next bay and making it difficult for the inferni to work. We've told the serfs to get out of here time after time, but they won't listen. Captain Frensoe has ordered everything to be burned down, and afterward, this area to be sealed off."

traits.locale_text: 「哀れな小屋を燃やしているのですよ、ロード・キャプテン！徒党を組んで小屋を建てると、隣のベイへの空気の供給が遮断され、インフェルニが働きづらくなる。農奴たちに何度も何度もここから出て行けと言ったが、聞く耳を持ちません。フレンソー中隊長はすべてを焼き払って一帯を封鎖するよう命じました」

languages.text: “正在烧掉这些破棚子，舰长大人！那群乌合之众到处乱盖棚子，把隔壁甲板的空气供应都切断了，还给控火公会成员的工作带来了很多麻烦。我们一次又一次地让那群渣滓滚开，可他们就是不听。于是弗伦索上尉下令把所有棚屋统统烧掉，之后封锁这片区域。”
languages.original_text: "Burning the poor shacks, Lord Captain! The rabble build them, cutting off the air supply to the next bay and making it difficult for the inferni to work. We've told the serfs to get out of here time after time, but they won't listen. Captain Frensoe has ordered everything to be burned down, and afterward, this area to be sealed off."

traits.locale_text: “正在烧掉这些破棚子，舰长大人！那群乌合之众到处乱盖棚子，把隔壁甲板的空气供应都切断了，还给控火公会成员的工作带来了很多麻烦。我们一次又一次地让那群渣滓滚开，可他们就是不听。于是弗伦索上尉下令把所有棚屋统统烧掉，之后封锁这片区域。”

languages.text: "Ich verbrenne diese armseligen Hütten, Lord Captain! Das Gesindel hat sie gebaut. Sie unterbrechen die Luftversorgung des nächsten Moduls und erschweren den Inferni die Arbeit. Wir haben den Sklaven befohlen, ab und an von hier zu verschwinden, aber sie hören nicht zu. Captain Frensoe hat angeordnet, alles niederzubrennen und das Gebiet anschließend abzuriegeln.
languages.original_text: "Burning the poor shacks, Lord Captain! The rabble build them, cutting off the air supply to the next bay and making it difficult for the inferni to work. We've told the serfs to get out of here time after time, but they won't listen. Captain Frensoe has ordered everything to be burned down, and afterward, this area to be sealed off."

traits.locale_text: "Ich verbrenne diese armseligen Hütten, Lord Captain! Das Gesindel hat sie gebaut. Sie unterbrechen die Luftversorgung des nächsten Moduls und erschweren den Inferni die Arbeit. Wir haben den Sklaven befohlen, ab und an von hier zu verschwinden, aber sie hören nicht zu. Captain Frensoe hat angeordnet, alles niederzubrennen und das Gebiet anschließend abzuriegeln.

languages.text: « Je brûle les taudis des pauvres, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine} ! Ils bloquent l'arrivée d'air alimentant la baie voisine et ils compliquent la tâche des inferni. On a pourtant dit aux serfs de déblayer le secteur à maintes reprises, mais ils ne veulent rien savoir. Le capitaine Frensoe nous a ordonné de tout réduire en cendres, après quoi on bouclera le périmètre. »
languages.original_text: "Burning the poor shacks, Lord Captain! The rabble build them, cutting off the air supply to the next bay and making it difficult for the inferni to work. We've told the serfs to get out of here time after time, but they won't listen. Captain Frensoe has ordered everything to be burned down, and afterward, this area to be sealed off."

traits.locale_text: « Je brûle les taudis des pauvres, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine} ! Ils bloquent l'arrivée d'air alimentant la baie voisine et ils compliquent la tâche des inferni. On a pourtant dit aux serfs de déblayer le secteur à maintes reprises, mais ils ne veulent rien savoir. Le capitaine Frensoe nous a ordonné de tout réduire en cendres, après quoi on bouclera le périmètre. »

languages.text: "Yoksulların barakalarını yakıyorum Lord Kaptan! Bunları ayaktakımı inşa etmiş. Yandaki bölmeye hava teminini keserek itfacıların çalışmasını zorlaştırıyorlar. Kölelere buradan gitmelerini defalarca söyledik ama bizi dinlemiyorlar. Yüzbaşı Frensoe, her şeyin baştan aşağı yıkılmasını ve ardından bu alanın kapatılmasını emretti."
languages.original_text: "Burning the poor shacks, Lord Captain! The rabble build them, cutting off the air supply to the next bay and making it difficult for the inferni to work. We've told the serfs to get out of here time after time, but they won't listen. Captain Frensoe has ordered everything to be burned down, and afterward, this area to be sealed off."
